description: 本課程旨在加深學生的英語能力，結合與科學及科技等相關主題規劃英語授課內容，期透過主題式課程增進學生興趣並提升英語基本能力及學術應用可能。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**COURSE     Autumn, 2018 Applied English: ESP Science**

**INSTRUCTOR        Ruei-fang, Shiang (Joyce)**

**COURSE DESCRIPTION**

This module aims to develop student’s academic English reading competence and the breadth of vocabulary related to science and fashion design. Students are expected to construct content knowledge that is relevant to different scientific disciplines and fashion industry through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

**TEXTBOOK**

Instructor-selected authentic reading materials.

**In this class, you will…**

Do simple and fun experiments

Read science/fashion design magazines

Have group competitions…

**GRADING POLICIES**

Each student are expected to actively participate in all types of in-class and out-of-class activities, group projects, etc.. The grading criteria are listed below:

Attendance  15%

(1% will be given if students present on time and bring the weekly reading article to class. Using smartphone or laptop for inappropriate purposes will be treated as absence. Two absences will result in failing of the course)

Group presentation  16%

Showcase Projects  22 %

Participation   47%  (whole class discussion, answering or asking question)
